column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The veal cheeks were succulent.  However
column2: note that the term "cheeks" equates to no more than the requisite TWO (as in one cheek per smallish quadrupedalism).  I had just enough "roasted winter vegetables" served on my plate to warrant the dutiful gaze of the busboy - incessantly assuming that I had already finished my meal.
